Message:
Flowers are delicate,
so they have to be treated
with lots of care.

That’s what Mom and Dad
taught me, but I still have
so much more to learn...

“I’m sorry, little flower.
I’m sure if Mom and Dad were here...”
The moment they came to mind,

I saw flashes of them lying
on the icy, cold floor...

...It happened again.
Lately, I’ve been seeing
flashes of that day.

The day when the Witch Hunt
took away my parents,
all because of me...

...Time to call it a day.
I’ll tend to the flowers
again tomorrow...

Huh? Flowers that were
full of cheer just a moment ago,
are now wilting...

As my trembling hands
touched the flowers,
they turned black and
withered away before
my very eyes...
